fr.uv1.bettingServices

Interface Competitor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Competitor, Person, Team

    public interface Competitor
    Author:
    segarra

    This interface declares all methods that should be provided by a competitor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMember(Competitor member)
      add a member to a team competitor.
      void deleteMember(Competitor member)
      delete a member from a team competitor.
      boolean hasValidName()
      tells if the name of the competitor is a valid one.

    • Method Detail

      • hasValidName

        boolean hasValidName()
        tells if the name of the competitor is a valid one.
        Returns:
        true if the competitor has a valid name.

      • addMember

        void addMember(Competitor member)
        throws ExistingCompetitorException,
               BadParametersException
        add a member to a team competitor.
        Parameters:
        member - the new member.
        Throws:
        ExistingCompetitorException - raised if the member is already registered for the team.
        BadParametersException - raised if the member is not instantiated.

      • deleteMember

        void deleteMember(Competitor member)
           throws BadParametersException,
                  ExistingCompetitorException
        delete a member from a team competitor.
        Parameters:
        member - the member to delete.
        Throws:
        BadParametersException - raised if the member is not instantiated.
        ExistingCompetitorException - raised if the member is not registered for the team.
